presentation.desc: I help businesses grow by crafting amazing web experiences. If you’re looking for a developer that likes to get stuff done
presentation.skillsubtitle: I am striving to never stop learning and improving
presentation.name: Your name
presentation.aboutp1: My name is Enricky and I specialize in full-stack web development. I have experience in developing native mobile applications, web applications and RESTfull APIs. Currently, I'm focused on mobile development with Java
presentation.aboutp2: I am a highly motivated individual and an eternal optimist, dedicated to writing clear, concise, and robust code that works. Striving to never stop learning and improving.
presentation.aboutp3: I like having my new challenges and technologies to learn
presentation.conctactdesc: I'm currently available for freelance work
presentation.projectsdesc: I had the pleasure of working with these awesome projects

projects.MovieApp: Android movie application, developed natively in Java, uses The Movie DB API.
projects.FinanceControlApi: RESTfull API for financial control, developed in Java/Spring Boot and POSTGRES database.
projects.FinanceControlApp: Financial control application, developed in Java, consumes the Finance Control API.
projects.WeatherApp: NextJs/TailwindCSS app with OpenWeatherMap API, provides accurate real-time weather information.
projects.StoreAPI: RESTfull API for product management, developed in NodeJs/Express/Prisma and MYSQL database.
projects.MidasStudio: Landing page developed for Midas Studio, using SEO concepts with React/TailwindCSS technologies.
projects.Pokedex: NextJs/StyledComponents project, consumes official Pokémon API, highlights pagination techniques.
projects.NetflixClone: Clone of the Netflix home page, challenge and practical learning in React/StyledComponents.
projects.FinanceControl: ReactJs/StyledComponents project for financial control, emphasizing learning React Hooks and UseStates.
projects.ViaCerta: Clone of the Via Certa (Manaus-AM) website in HTML/CSS/JavaScript, including image carousel and hamburger menu
